posts.title: Deep CNN-Based Blind Image Quality Predictor in Python
posts.subTitle: A step by step guide to implement the Deep CNN-Based Blind Image Quality Predictor (DIQA) in Python
posts.description: In this tutorial, I present a step by step guide to implement the Deep CNN-Based Blind Image Quality Predictor (DIQA) algorithm using TensorFlow 2.0 data pipelines and Keras functional API.

posts.title: Image Quality Assessment: A Survey
posts.subTitle: Description of the most recent methods for image quality assessment
posts.description: Description of the most recent methods for image quality assessment. A survey with the latest techniques and some of their theory is presented. A work in progress tensorflow 2.0 notebook is included.

posts.title: Improving Image Quality in Property Finder
posts.subTitle: Description of my experience in Property Finder to foster users to improve the image quality of their content.
posts.description: Description of my experience in Property Finder to foster users to improve the image quality of their content.

posts.title: Setting two GPU in your laptop: eGPU in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
posts.subTitle: Step by Step to configure an eGPU in Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
posts.description: Some months ago, I decided to buy a new laptop with enough power to crunch data. At that time, I also had a desktop with a GTX 1070, but I stopped using it because of the convenience of my new…

posts.title: Image Feature Extraction: Local Binary Patterns with Cython
posts.subTitle: Brief explanation of local binary patterns with Python and an impressively fast speed up with Cython.
posts.description: Local binary patterns are used by several applications to help machine learning algorithms to learn faster. Although it’s implementation is not hard, it is a good example to experiment with Cython.

posts.title: Automatic Image Quality Assessment in Python
posts.subTitle: Step by step guide to code BRISQUE method for automatic image quality assessment
posts.description: In this article, I present a brief introduction to image quality assessment and the necessary python code to calculate the BRISQUE method.
